scripts.install:api: echo API && cd api_server && npm i --no-save
scripts.install:broadcaster: echo BROADCASTER && cd broadcaster && npm i --no-save
scripts.install:mailin: echo INBOUND_EMAIL && cd inbound_email && npm i --no-save
scripts.install:mailout: echo OUTBOUND_EMAIL && cd outbound_email && npm i --no-save
scripts.install:opadm: echo ONPREM_ADMIN && cd onprem_admin && npm i --no-save
scripts.install:all: npm run runtime-dirs && npm run install:api && npm run install:broadcaster && npm run install:mailin && npm run install:mailout && npm run install:opadm
scripts.start:opadm: cd onprem_admin && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.docker:build:api: echo API && cd api_server && npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:build:broadcaster: echo BROADCASTER && cd broadcaster && npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:build:mailout: echo OUTBOUND_EMAIL && cd outbound_email && npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:build:opadm: echo ONPREM_ADMIN && cd onprem_admin && npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:build:all: npm run docker:build:api && npm run docker:build:broadcaster && npm run docker:build:mailout && npm run docker:build:opadm
scripts.docker:remove-all-vols: docker volume rm $(docker volume ls|awk '{print $2}'|grep -v VOL)
